quotes.text: Autism doesn’t have to define a person. Artists with autism are like anyone else: They define themselves through hard work and individuality.
quotes.author: Adrienne Bailon, Artist

quotes.text: It seems that for success in science or art, a dash of autism is essential.
quotes.author: Hans Asperger

quotes.text: Even for parents of children that are not on the spectrum, there is no such thing as a normal child.
quotes.author: Violet Stevens

quotes.text: When enough people care about autism or diabetes or global warming, it helps everyone, even if only a tiny fraction actively participate.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.text: To measure the success of our societies, we should examine how well those with different abilities, including persons with autism, are integrated as full and valued members.
quotes.author: Secretary General Ban Ki-Moon

quotes.text: If I could snap my fingers and be nonautistic, I would not. Autism is part of what I am.
quotes.author: Dr. Temple Grandin

quotes.text: Autism is about having a pure heart and being very sensitive… It is about finding a way to survive in an overwhelming, confusing world… It is about developing differently, in a different pace and with different leaps.
Autism: Where the “randomness of life” collides and clashes with an individual’s need for the sameness.
quotes.author: Eileen Miller

quotes.text: Why Fit in when you were born to standout?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Autism, seeing the world from a different angle.
Though devastating at first, Autism isn’t the end of the world. It’s the beginning of a whole new one.
Society says I’m Autistic. God says I’m Perfect!
I do not suffer from Autism, but I do suffer from the way you treat me.
quotes.author: Tyler Durdin

quotes.text: If you’ve met A child with autism, you’ve met A child with autism. Each and every one of them is so wonderfully different.
children with autism are angels who lost their way to heaven and fell down on earth.
Autism is as much a part of humanity as is the capacity to dream.
quotes.author: Kathleen Seidel

quotes.text: Autism is not contagious, but kindness is…
